subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham, fresh off a flight from London after playing for England on Wednesday, got feisty after being tackled from behind by Jesse Marsch of Chivas USA last night in a 3-0 win over the Los Angeles Galaxy in Carson, Calif.Marsch ran up behind Beckham, the Galaxy’s captain, and applied a high kick to his upper right hip during injury time at the end of the first half. Beckham ran up to Marsch, shouting in his face. A shoving match ensued between the teams.Beckham was in the starting lineup about six hours after arriving from London.
